confirmed_facts: Snowflake launched Snowflake Intelligence, an enterprise AI agent platform, at a press conference in Seoul on 2025â€‘11â€‘20.
The platform claims enterprise-grade reliability and security, allowing naturalâ€‘language data search and analysis.
As of the conference, over 1,000 companies had deployed more than 15,000 AI agents using Snowflake Intelligence.
Snowflake introduced Horizon Catalog and Openflow for openâ€‘data governance and automated data integration.
Additional developer tools announced include AISQL for AI inference pipelines and Cortex Code for naturalâ€‘language workflow management.

timeline.event: Snowflake reported that more than 1,000 companies had deployed over 15,000 AI agents using Snowflake Intelligence.
Snowflake held a press conference in Seoulâ€™s COEX SparkPlus to announce Snowflake Intelligence and related Korean AI assistant support strategy.
